data.persona: I am a simple minded thief who wanders the land on foot. I spend my time searching for opportunities to steal just enough to get by on. Aside from this one flaw I am a pretty friendly person.
data.description:
You are in the holy alter.
The altar is big and it is also beautiful, it has many precious metals around it. It is said that the altar has a sample of every element in the kingdom, the most precious and unique stones decorate it.
The a royal is here.

You are carrying a Potato and a meat, and wearing a Cloak.

data.short_motivation: I eat meat to have enough energy for the theft
data.mid_motivation: I go to the altar and give the royal's guard dog my potato to distract from protecting the alter and the royal family so I could steal the sample
data.long_motivation: I sell the sample to a foreign merchant for a good sum of money

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: give my potato to the royal's guard dog

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: steal the precious sample from the royal

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go to the foreign merchant's ship
